title: Soothify: LLM Based RAG system for Mental Health Support
description: Developed mental health support LLM-based model that integrates Hume AI and ChatGPT to assess panic attack severity via voice-to-chat interactions, offering calming techniques or directing to nearby professionals.

title: Airbnb Recommendation System Using GPT-2 and RAG
description: Enhanced recommendation accuracy by developing a hotel recommendation system using GPT-2 and Hugging Face Transformers, applying prompt engineering and fine-tuning on LLMs to improve response relevance and personalization.

title: QuantDash: Full-Stack Finance Analytics Dashboard with ML Predictions
description: Built a full-stack financial analytics dashboard using the MERN stack, enabling financial data visualization and performance tracking, by displaying 6+ interactive charts using Chart.js to display key financial metrics and KPIs.

title: License Plate Detection System Using YOLOv11
description: This project implements a comprehensive cryptocurrency analysis platform that processes and visualizes market data for thousands of cryptocurrencies.
